mapper.select: SELECT * FROM product p JOIN image i ON p.product_id = i.product_id WHERE p.product_id = #{productId} AND i.main = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review ( product_id, member_id, content, rate, size, brightness, color, thickness, delivery, packaging ) VALUES ( #{productId}, #{memberId}, #{content}, #{rate}, #{size}, #{brightness}, #{color}, #{thickness}, #{delivery}, #{packaging} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM review r JOIN `member` m ON r.member_id = m.member_id WHERE product_id = #{productId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment ( review_id, member_id, content ) VALUES ( #{reviewId}, #{memberId}, #{content} )
mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id, c.review_id, c.member_id, c.content, date_format(c.rdate,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as rdate, m.name FROM comment c JOIN `member` m ON c.member_id = m.member_id
